titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the knights, esquires, ministers, gentlemen, and free-holders, in the countie palatine of Lancaster. Presented, May 2. 1642. With His Majesties letter to the major of Kingston upon Hull, 25. of April, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

notesStmt.note: A variant has title: The humble petition o t e [sic] knights, esquires, ministers, gentl emen [sic], a nd [sic] free-holders, in the countie palatine of Lancaster. Presented, May 2. 1642. With His Majesti es [sic] tter [sic] to the major of Kingston upon Hull, 25. of April, 64 [sic].
